attributes.action: AMEND EMPLOYMENT LAW TO COVER UNFAIR PRACTICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Action to amend employment law so that employers cannot use equal opportunites for their own usage.
eg - interviewing candidates from other geographic areas within the UK to satisfy their own equal opps remit with no intention of employing said candidate.
2. To prevent employers discriminating against job seekers applying for full time work who have chosen to temp in the past.
3. To protect temporary employees by giving them equal rights.
